summary: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.
cast: Paul Newman|George Kennedy|J.D. Cannon|Lou Antonio|Robert Drivas|Strother Martin|Jo Van Fleet|Clifton James|Morgan Woodward|Luke Askew|Marc Cavell|Richard Davalos|Robert Donner|Warren Finnerty|Dennis Hopper|John McLiam|Wayne Rogers|Harry Dean Stanton|Charles Tyner|Ralph Waite|Anthony Zerbe|Buck Kartalian|Joy Harmon|Joe Don Baker|James Bradley Jr.|James Gammon|Norman Goodwins|Chuck Hicks|Rance Howard|James Jeter|Kim Kahana|Robert Luster|Donn Pearce|John Pearce|Cyril 'Chips' Robinson|Eddie Rosson|Rush Williams
title: La leyenda del indomable
